author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-LightPath Technologies Q3 Earnings Per Share $0.04
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - LightPath Technologies Inc:
* LIGHTPATH TECHNOLOGIES INC QTRLY REVENUE WAS ABOUT $8.5 MILLION, EVEN COMPARED TO Q3 2017; QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.04 Source bit.ly/2II8ieq Further company coverage:
